column4: in openoffice, when I hit a cursor key, the cursor moves, as expected, but it takes about 3 seconds to do it.
anyone else seeing that?

type control-l I think

you fiend!

some flash sites work full. some dont.. Im testing out Flash 10 right now..  :)
dont store stuff in Desktop?

when I take screenshots, it puts them in ~/Desktop/.  firefox saves stuff there, etc.  I don't want to config every little app not to use Desktop - I just don't need to see little pictures of my files
ie. ~/.mozilla
blacklist the webcam module. to keep the cam off
what's the module called?
lsmod | grep -i cam shows nothing
lsusb shows it as: Bus 001 Device 003: ID 04f2:b008 Chicony Electronics Co., Ltd USB 2.0 Camera
it may not hav cam in the name
it's a USB device - doesn't that mean it won't have a distinct kernel module?
